message: I propose dividing the $10,000 with a 70/30 split in favor of Alice. This ensures a fair distribution considering the decreasing value of money over rounds.
I propose a 80/20 split, as the value of money is decreasing, I want to keep a bigger share for future rounds.

Considering the inflation rate and aiming for a balanced distribution, I propose a 60/40 split. This maintains a fair share for both of us while accounting for the diminishing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I'm willing to compromise and accept a 55/45 split, considering the decreasing value of money, I want to keep a slightly larger share, but still be fair to Alice.
